Table of Contents

Class LifetimeEntryManager

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics.Performance
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Provides time-optimised updates for lifetime change notifications. This is used in specialised CompositeDrawables to optimise lifetime changes (see: LifetimeManagementContainer).

public class LifetimeEntryManager

Remarks

The time complexity of updating lifetimes is O(number of alive items).

Update(double)

Updates the lifetime of entries at a single time value.

Parameters

The time to update at.

Returns

Updates the lifetime of entries within a given time range.

The start of the time range.
